property.name: Id
property.friendlyName: Id of the instance, generated by module.

property.name: StdinStdout
property.friendlyName: Are commands going to accept and return JSON encoded service via stdin/stdout

property.name: UseCmdLinePlugin
property.friendlyName: Are commands going to use plugin command line app for provisioning

property.name: AddExecuteCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to add service, begin transaction

property.name: AddCommitCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to add service, commit transaction

property.name: AddRollbackCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to add service, rollback transaction

property.name: RemoveExecuteCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to remove service, begin transaction

property.name: RemoveCommitCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to remove service, commit transaction

property.name: RemoveRollbackCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to remove service, rollback transaction

property.name: ModifyExecuteCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to modify service, begin transaction

property.name: ModifyCommitCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to modify service, commit transaction

property.name: ModifyRollbackCmd
property.friendlyName: Command to be executed to modify service, rollback transaction

complexService.name: CsMustBeOne
complexService.friendlyName: It is required that there is at least one complex service defined. Otherwise we will get error in UCP client.
